<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Asset Filters</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/asm/api/v1/asset/filters"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns the list of supported asset filters and their values. You can use these filters and their values on other APIs to fetch the required assets.

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Ok

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"serviceTypes"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"List of service types","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cloudTypes"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`AWS`, `GCP`, `AZURE`, `ALIBABA_CLOUD`]"} schema={{"description":"List of cloud types","uniqueItems":true,"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["AWS","GCP","AZURE","ALIBABA_CLOUD"]}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"assetTypes"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`Domain`, `ResponsiveIP`]"} schema={{"description":"List of asset types","type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["Domain","ResponsiveIP"]}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"snoozeStatus"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`SNOOZED`, `ACTIVE`]"} schema={{"description":"List of snooze status","type":"array","items":{"type":"string","description":"Indicates if the notifications from these assets are snoozed.","enum":["SNOOZED","ACTIVE"]}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountMappingStatus"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`MAPPED`, `UNMAPPED`]"} schema={{"type":"array","description":"**Mapped** indicates that the asset is connected to a parent account or organizational unit (OU) on Prisma Cloud, whereas **unmapped** signifies that the asset is not associated with any parent account or OU on Prisma Cloud.","items":{"type":"string","enum":["MAPPED","UNMAPPED"]}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"managedCommunication"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`TRUE`, `FALSE`]"} schema={{"description":"This parameter is used to filter unmanaged assets based on the unmanaged assets communication with managed assets.\n\n The default value is **False**.\n\n True - To get all the unmanaged assets communicating with managed assets on Prisma Cloud.\n\n False - To get all the unmanaged assets that are not communicating with managed assets on Prisma Cloud.\n\n Empty array or specifying both [True, False] - To get all unmanaged assets irrespective of their connection with managed assets.\n","uniqueItems":true,"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["TRUE","FALSE"]}}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"serviceTypes\": [\n    \"string\"\n  ],\n  \"cloudTypes\": [\n    \"AWS\"\n  ],\n  \"assetTypes\": [\n    \"Domain\"\n  ],\n  \"snoozeStatus\": [\n    \"SNOOZED\"\n  ],\n  \"accountMappingStatus\": [\n    \"MAPPED\"\n  ],\n  \"managedCommunication\": [\n    \"TRUE\"\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>
